titleStmt.title: To the Kings Most Excellent Majesty. The humble petition of [blank] sheweth, that we Your Majesties most dutiful and loyal subjects, having all along behaved our selves with an humble and modest patience and submission, amongst the most eminent dangers, and most signal disappointments ...

notesStmt.note: Title from heading and first lines of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
